column5: Just some more smoked pork porn....First I seasoned with the rack with a pork rub and then smoked with apple wood....
That looks a little too perfect.  Are you sure those aren't implants?  Can I decide for myself if you let me touch it?
mmmmm.. im comin to ny! LOL
You can look but don't touch...LOL
How long did that smoke for Billy Bob  Looks delicious  Cheers  Craig
It took longer than I thought it would....5.25 hours
A tender rack would be good for a snack before bed time
That s a nice rack BillyBob, but I have to break the news to ya. Canadian Pork racks rock

Yes, but here's the thing.....I live less then 15 miles from our boarder and have been to the Great White North hundreds of times. So who's to say that this rack has some Canadian or not in them...  Only the consumer will know or will they.....
Nice looking rack, your makin me hungry.
